C

cancelListener(Inventory, Cart, ArrayList<Product>) - Static method in class app.Store
cancelListener semi-recursively keeps the player within the options loop to remove an item from their cart until the 'q' button is pushed.
checkoutListener(Cart, ArrayList<Product>, Inventory) - Static method in class app.Store
checkoutListener gets the total price for the player's cart, making sure that they can afford their whole cart then allows the purchase, exchanging the items for gold.
clearScreen() - Static method in class app.Store
pseudo-clearScreen.
